trans-unit.source: The Pkcs9MessageDigest class defines the message digest of a CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: Pkcs9MessageDigest 類別會定義 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的訊息摘要。

trans-unit.source: A Pkcs9MessageDigest object will be automatically generated and placed in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property whenever the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the corresponding signer is not empty.
trans-unit.target: Pkcs9MessageDigest 物件自動產生並放在<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性每當<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>對應簽署者的屬性不是空白。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The Pkcs9MessageDigest constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Pkcs9MessageDigest 建構函式建立的執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This method replaces the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest> object with the specified <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會取代目前<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest>物件具有指定<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object from which to copy information.
The MessageDigest property retrieves the message digest.
trans-unit.target: MessageDigest 屬性擷取的訊息摘要。

trans-unit.source: An array of byte values that contains the message digest.
trans-unit.target: 位元組值陣列，其中包含訊息摘要。
